entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of drizzle. Low zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Periods of drizzle ending this evening then cloudy with 60 percent chance of drizzle changing to 60 percent chance of flurries before morning. Risk of freezing drizzle this evening and overnight. Fog patches dissipating before morning. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:56 PM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 2 in the afternoon. POP 60%
